title: There Ain’t No Such Thing as a Dovish Hike
content: at 09:29 AM EDT There’s been a lot of talk about the possibility of a “dovish hike” at the conclusion of its meeting–and how that could be good news for the financial markets. Bloomberg News The argument goes something like this: The Fed raises interest rates by 0.25 percentage points of so, but brings the so-called dots down so […]
